# VTFrameProcessorOpticalFlow

**Class**

A class to wrap bidirectional optical flow to send to the processor.

## Declaration

```swift
class VTFrameProcessorOpticalFlow
```

## Overview

Instances retain the buffers backing them.

## Creating an optical flow configuration

- **init(forwardFlow:backwardFlow:)**: Creates an object with forward and backward optical flow pixel buffers.

## Inspecting the configuration

- **backwardFlow**: The backward optical flow pixel buffer that was provided when the object was created.
- **forwardFlow**: The forward optical flow pixel that was provided when the object was created.

## Optical flow

- **VTOpticalFlowConfiguration**: A configuration object that enables optical flow on a frame processing session.
- **VTOpticalFlowParameters**: An object that describes frame-level optical flow parameters.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
